name: fishki.net comment.php cleaner
description: quick and dirty cleaner for fishki.net's /comment.php?id=* pages
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.fishki.net/comment.php"), url-prefix("http://fishki.net/comment.php"), url-prefix("https://www.fishki.net/comment.php"), url-prefix("https://fishki.net/comment.php"), url-prefix("http://girls.fishki.net/comment.php"), url-prefix("http://auto.fishki.net/comment.php"),  url-prefix("http://photo.fishki.net/comment.php"), url-prefix("http://anti.fishki.net/comment.php"),
url-prefix("http://girlsfishki.net/comment.php")  {
   div[class^="header"],
   ul[class="toplinks"],
   ul[class="topmenu"],
   div[class="topbookmarks"],
   div[class="whidebox"],
   div[id*="medialand_"],
   div[id*="lx_"],
   div[class^="leftcolumn"],
   div[class^="leftbox"],
   div[class*="mb"],
   div[class="footer"],
   div[class="recomended"],
   div[id="viewCloud"],
   div[id="readme"],
/*   div[class="undertopic"],*/
   div[class="commentsbox"],
   div[class="commentsbox odd"],
   div[class="registerneed"],
   div[class="whitebox paddingbox"],
   div[class="readmetable"],
   iframe,
   a.film-branding-link-top,
   div[id*="vk_"]
   {
      display: none !important;
   }
}
